job.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer - Java OR Ruby
job.description: If you are a strongSenior FullStack Software Engineerstrong with experience please read onbrbrThis is a strong100 REMOTE position foreverstrongbrbrWe are a niche FinTech that is growing and continually transforming our industry We are looking for a Senior FullStack Software Engineer to join our team We are looking for someone steeped in either Java or Ruby who loves the FinTech world and is all about rolling up their sleeves and wearing many hatsbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Design and develop high quality scalable multithreaded multitier webbased applications using the latest technologies and software best practiceslili Be responsible for collaborating on a crossfunctional team in storymapping exercises in certain cases sharing the responsibilities with the Principal Engineer in outlining the overall scope and user story process of product developments and enhancements for a project participate in release plan overview as well as identifying areas of risk amp exposure in group discussionslili Participate in retrospectives sprint planning and sprint reviews for the teamlili Participate in directing dedicated QA testing resources for the team youre working onlili Work with cross functional team in an agile SDLC collaborate with product owners technical teammembers business stakeholders and designers to implement enhancements or new applicationslili Propose innovative solutions to complex problemslili Work closely with local and remote team members and management to achieve high team morale and productivitylili Share best practices and improve processes within and across agile teamsbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Bachelors degree in Computer Science preferredlili 5 Years of experience as a fullstack engineerlili Demonstrated leadership experience either project or people leadershiplili Needs strong understanding of quality systems continuous integration unit and integration testinglili Sound knowledge of strongRuby on Rails or Javastronglili Proven strong understanding of design patternslili Proven strong understanding of ServiceOriented Architecturelili Background in a MVCbased implementation of a web platformlili Demonstrated ability to work well in ambiguous situations and pivot quicklylili Demonstrated experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologieslili Proven ability to multitask organize and prioritize workbrliulWhats In It for YoubrbrWe offer a compensation package of base bonus and equity in a collaborative environment with great leadershipbrbrstrongThis is a 100 full REMOTE position foreverbrbrstrongSo if you are a Senior FullStack Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrRhonaKannonCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  RK31644101  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulRhona Kannon  Principal Director  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
